messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to KINGDOM STATION. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on KINGDOM STATION have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The god blessed us with the glow on this holy land

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone going against the kingdom. Will be executed for mutiny and enemy of the kingdom

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a pack of wire eating mammals have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.
